name: Andrew Zang
headerTaglineTwo: I'm Andrew Zang, a software engineer

services.title: Art Direction
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Branding
services.description: We design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: We build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

services.title: 3D Design
services.description: We combine creative design and technical skills to build striking 3D visualisations that bring your project to life.

aboutpara: My name is Xiancheng Zang, I go by Andrew. I'm currently a 3rd year student studying computer science and finance at the University of Waterloo.

resume.tagline: ðŸ‘‹  I'm a software engineer, product designer.
resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: Led two engineers, architected and built multiple microservices from scratch for supporting video from AWS, led to decrease in load time by 66% and saved million-dollar costs for the next 5 years â€¢	Created video upload and process pipeline using NodeJS, AWS (S3, MediaConvert, Transcribe), Kafka â€¢	Set up Edge Lambda for fast authorization and hiding origins from clients to prevent malicious attacks â€¢	Configured AWS (CloudFront) to serve videos to 1M+ active users with handling clientsâ€™ permissions â€¢	Established WebSocket between microservices to retrieve real-time update from AWS (CloudWatch, SNS) â€¢	Built CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, orchestrated local and production setup with Docker and K8s from scratch

Implemented a back-end engine that delivers context-specific help to users directly from the platform â€¢ Architected backend communications between microservices with adapting different development stages of the application using Node.js, Express.js, Docker, K8s, Mocha, OpenAPI, Bash â€¢	Enhanced feature toggling and reduced creation of more than ten deliverables to one in CMS â€¢	Developed multiple reusable UI components with JavaScript and SAPUI5 (Angular), adjusted contents with different hyperscale cloud providers (AWS, Azure and GCP) â€¢	Fixed ~10 bugs, wrote unit and component, increased code stability by 8%

Implemented two models for classifying issuer risk and potential future exposure data using Pandas and NumPy (Python), brought down a one-day process to five minutes â€¢	Built a fully automated web application with React and Python to improve counterparty information update process, transformed data to XML format and upload into an internal system â€¢	Wrote SQL queries to pull out data from various database engines, wrangled and preprocessed data for analysis
